documentation.author: Terry Wright
documentation.purpose: Automatically add an Active, Confirmed, Medical Pneumothorax problem to patient's problem list if any Physician or MLP position adds a related ICD9 code as Admitting, Final or Discharge and the patient does not already have a similar Active Medical problem.
documentation.explanation: Rule triggers upon a diagnosis event. Diagnosis type needs to be either Admitting, Discharge or Final. Rule will enter a Pneumothorax problem with the Confirmation = Confirmed, Classification = Medical, Status = Active.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DIAGNOSIS_E
templateDefinitions.definition: OPT_DIAGNOSIS with OPT_QUALIFIER, OPT_CONFIRMATION, OPT_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_CLINICAL_SERVICE, OPT_DX_TYPE, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_RANK, OPT_CERTAINTY were ACTION_TYPE. Optionally narrow diagnosis matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DIAGNOSIS_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: OPT_DIAGNOSIS with OPT_QUALIFIER, OPT_CONFIRMATION, OPT_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_CLINICAL_SERVICE, OPT_DX_TYPE, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_RANK, OPT_CERTAINTY were ACTION_TYPE. Optionally narrow diagnosis matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS. Find all matches OPT_MATCH_ALL.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PROBLEMS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: OPT_PROBLEMS exist with OPT_QUALIFIER, OPT_CONFIRMATION, OPT_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_LIFE_CYCLE_STATUS, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_COURSE for person LINK. Optionally narrow problem matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS. Find all matches OPT_MATCH_ALL.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PROBLEMS_ADD_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Add PROBLEMS with OPT_QUALIFIER, CONFIRMATION, CLASSIFICATION, LIFE_CYCLE_STATUS, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_COURSE, OPT_COMMENT for person LINK.
